Observed at: North Mountain 3:00 AM ADT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10 except 6 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High 10 except 6 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023
